snippet.title: Oktoberfest - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Free to play right now on Meta Quest 👉 https://www.meta.com/experiences/oktoberfest/6605242869557912/

Get ready to experience the magic of the world's largest folk festival like never before! Oktoberfest-The Official Game is free-to-play today on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro. This one-of-a-kind social VR experience brings the excitement, culture, and atmosphere of Munich's legendary Oktoberfest right to your home.

Explore a meticulously recreated Theresienwiese, the iconic grounds of Oktoberfest, where you can roam through bustling beer tents, thrilling fairground rides, and lively game booths. Whether you're customizing your avatar, enjoying virtual food and drink, or challenging your friends to multiplayer games, this is a VR adventure designed for everyone.

Whether you're new to the world of Oktoberfest or a longtime fan, this is your chance to celebrate the festival in a whole new way—through the power of virtual reality. Don't miss the launch on September 20th!

Join the Oktoberfest community and experience the excitement with friends. Cheers! 🍺🎮 


#Oktoberfest #OktoberfestVR #metaquest  #vr
